example.text: Today I met with [[user]] to demand that the [[user]] use the tools Congress gave it to better protect Main Street from Wall Street. Big hedge funds that just care about short-term profits abuse our outdated rules to fire workers, gut companies, & leave communities devastated. [[url]]

I am proud to have worked across the aisle to earn bipartisan support for our Respect for Marriage Act and am overcome with joy to see President Biden make marriage equality the law of the land." Sen. Baldwin with her friends Margaret & Denise, and their daughter Maria (Left) and Sen. Baldwin at the White House for the signing of her Respect for Marriage Act into law (Right) Read more about Senator Baldwin's leadership to make marriage equality the law of the land here.

For too long, we’ve seen the lack of competition in our health insurance marketplace drive up costs for patients, limiting their affordable options. I introduced legislation to crack down on anti-competitive practices of big hospitals and cut health care costs for Wisconsinites. [[url]]

Our bill would eliminate this offshoring incentive. Treating "foreign" corporations that are managed and controlled in the US as domestic corporations.
